Scanner

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Scanner.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class is the main controller for the program. All functionality is initiated from this modal. All new functionality will originate from this interface.

      Sets all currently selected filters in the Packet Manager and displays results to the console.

      Disables ports when only ARP protocol is selected

      Deletes the temporary capture, clears text currently displayed in the console, and clears all previously selected filters

      Verifies source IP box is not checked
      void handleICMPCheckBoxSelect()
      Verifies that only one Protocol is checked

      Opens the tcpdump file specified by the user.
